title: Sancallie 36" X 25" Rotating & Adjustable Puzzle Board Easel,Wooden Jigsaw Puzzle Table with 4 Sorting Drawers Tilted Angles Non-Slip Suede Surface for Up to 1,500 Pieces Puzzles with PP Cover
features: 2-In-1 Design -- This Stand has three adjustable angles and its maximum tilt angle is 30 degrees. You can adjust the angle according to preference and comfort to avoid stiff neck and back pain. 360°spinning is convenient for you to rotate to reach any area of the puzzle board and it makes you enjoy the fun of jigsaw puzzle!

Built-In-Independent Stand Design -- The combination of the puzzle board and the stand, built-in independent stand design, when not in use, the stand can be easily put into the puzzle board as a convenient storage and save room for you.

Up for 1500 Pieces -- The board is made of pine wood and MDF, sturdy and durable. The inner diameter of the puzzle board measures 35.43 x 24.41in, which is suitable for most 1500 pieces puzzles. The puzzle board is covered with fleece, which can increase friction and effectively prevent the puzzle from sliding down.

Comes with 4 Drawers -- 4 different color drawers can both sort the puzzles and conveniently store your unfinished puzzle pieces. Each drawer is specially designed with a small magnet to ensure all drawers stay closed when they stored to prevent pieces from getting lost. Comes with a PP cover, which can protect your puzzles from dust, water and pets well.

Easy to Move Around -- You can play with the puzzle wherever you want and also easy to move the unfinished puzzle to other places. When you need extra seating space or when you are having a meal, simply cover your puzzle with the puzzle cover, close the drawer and move it under the couch or bed, your puzzle can be easily stored and kept safe in seconds.
description: Product description Material: Pine + MDF + velvet Color: Pine wood color + khaki velvet fabric Product Size: 36.22×25.2×1.26in/92×64×3.2cm Inside Dimension: 35.43×24.41in/90×62cm Drawer outer size: 10.75×9.57×0.71in/27.3×24.3×1.8cm Stand size: 24.0×15.4×0.87in/61×39×2.2cm PP cover size: 35.2×24.2in/89.5×61.5cm Drawer colors are purple, yellow, blue, and grey Turntable size: 12in (need to install) Accessories: head handles x 5 + screws x 5 turntable screws x 4 Package weight: 17.2lb/7.8kg Package size: 38.39×28.35×1.8in/97.5×72×4.5cm This Becko US 2-in-1 Rotatable & Adjustable Angle Puzzle Board is made of pine and MDF. The surface is covered with a soft fleece fabric that increases friction and prevents puzzle pieces from falling off, even when the puzzle board is tilted to a certain angle. Product usable area 35.43×24.41in/90×62cm, suitable for most 1500 pieces jigsaw puzzles, matching 3-speed angle adjustment bracket, tilting angle, reduce neck, waist or back fatigue, enjoy the fun of jigsaw puzzles. Comes with 4 high quality velvet drawers in different colors help to sort the puzzles, PP cover can protect the puzzles from messing by the pets while storing. With this product, you can enjoy the fun of jigsaw puzzle more. Safety Warning No warning
